content.prompt: The work was found in which of the following contexts?

choices.label: Painted on the wall of a cave
Located in a rock shelter in the mountains
Embedded in the ruins of an ancient temple

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
